getImageDescriptor

public static org.eclipse.jface.resource.ImageDescriptor getImageDescriptor(java.lang.String name)
Gets the image descriptor for the icons used in SEURAT. This is where the icon path is set up as well. The image descriptor is an empty URL and the icon directory.

Parameters:
name - - the name of the icon
Returns:
- the image descriptor
